channel.title: Bravo on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Bravo on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Next Gen NYC’ Creator on How ‘RHOSLC’ Led to New Bravo Show and Shutting Down “Nepo” Baby Skeptics: “It’s a Fun Situation”
item.description: To celebrate the season one finale, Michaline Babich chatted with The Hollywood Reporter about how ‘Next Gen’ overcame early doubt and won viewers over as one of the network’s hottest new shows.

item.title: ‘Next Gen NYC’ Creator on How ‘RHOSLC’ Led to New Bravo Show and Shutting Down “Nepo” Baby Skeptics: “It’s a Fun Situation”
item.description: To celebrate the season one finale, Michaline Babich chatted with The Hollywood Reporter about how ‘Next Gen’ overcame early doubt and won viewers over as one of the network’s hottest new shows.

item.title: Emily Simpson Almost Took a Break From ‘The Real Housewives of Orange County’ Amid Her Son’s Health Diagnosis
item.description: The reality star opens up to The Hollywood Reporter about how she navigated her child’s health condition in real time during season 19 and which of her co-stars she felt the most supported by.

item.title: Emily Simpson Almost Took a Break From ‘The Real Housewives of Orange County’ Amid Her Son’s Health Diagnosis
item.description: The reality star opens up to The Hollywood Reporter about how she navigated her child’s health condition in real time during season 19 and which of her co-stars she felt the most supported by.

item.title: Jax Taylor Exits ‘The Valley’ for Season 3: “Taking This Time Is Necessary”
item.description: The ‘Vanderpump Rules’ alum released a statement about why he’s “stepping away” from the Bravo series.
